response.job_title: Backend developer | Python | Django | Flask | FastAPI
response.summary:
Hi! I'm a Colombian Engineer, passionate in SW/HW development, with interests in software engineering, specifically in backend development. I love data, so I'd like to improve my skills in Data-driven techniques and participate in data engineering and data science projects. 

I've extensive knowledge in Python Backend development (Python - Django - FastAPI), fundamentals in data science, SQL, no-SQL databases and some of electronic design. I'm constantly learning and support initiatives that promote the democratization of knowledge.
response.skills: AWS core, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Cloud Computing, Deep Learning, Artificial Neural Networks, SQL, NoSQL, Pandas, Seaborn, Plotly, NLTK, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Python, Django, Flask, Kanban, Scrum, Scrapy, Java, JavaScript
